titles.title: A bill to transfer jurisdiction over certain lands in Bernalillo County, New Mexico, from the General Services Administration to the Veterans' Administration.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on Federal Services, Post Office.

calendar.text: Committee on Governmental Affairs. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Governmental Affairs. Reported to Senate by Senator Glenn without amendment. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 289.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Government Operations.
Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Referred to Subcommittee on Government Activities and Transportation.

committee.subcommittee: Federal Services, Post Office, and Civil Service
committee.name: Senate Governmental Affairs

bill.summary: 5/12/1987--Introduced. Transfers certain real property located in Bernalillo County, New Mexico, from the General Services Administration to the Veterans Administration.
